channel.title: Teamview? Mac? Aggravation via Server. Need Some Help (:
channel.description: If someone could assist me with team viewer i will be more than grateful, I'm trying to get my server up and running but i can't seem to connect with a different computer. i'm almost positive that the port forwarding is accurate, i'm using Transmission i've also tried setting myself as the Local DMZ host for my Verizon Router. If someone helps me trouble shoot this it's a promised co or mod position. Feel free to PM me or reply to this post, thanks in advance.
